description: Vegetation patch feature - places a cluster of features

type.description: Vegetation patch feature - places a cluster of features

ground_block.description: Block this feature will use to build a platform out of

depth.description: Depth to construct the base to using ground_block. Set to 0 to place no base

vertical_range.description: Radius to search for placement surfaces on vertically

extra_deep_block_chance.description: Chance to add one to the depth for columns of the base

vegetation_chance.description: Chance that a surface block will have a vegetation feature placed on it

extra_edge_column_chance.description: Chance to add columns on the edge of the placement range to the placement area

waterlogged.description: Do not set this to true, it's buggy. Use a scatter feature instead
